Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    DataManager class which does all the transfer of data and calling of methods between classes
    Author:
    stk4

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItemToOrder(java.lang.String item)
      add's an item to the "Basket" i orderPanel
      void addOrder(int numb, int quant)
      calls getChoosenMenu() method from ItemPanel which returns what kind of menu the user has chosen from, than getting the chosen element out of an ArrayList inside the DataManager class and adding that to the current Order
      int checkNumberOfOrderItems()
      return the size of the ArrayList in the current order

      java.util.ArrayList<Sides> getSidesArray() 
      java.util.ArrayList<Pizza> getSmallPizza()
      filters all the small pizzas out of the pizzaArray and put them into a separate ArrayList
      void loadDrinkMenu()
      loads the DrinkMenu from the "drinkMenu.xml" in the Menu folder and adds the date to the ArrayList drinkArrays
      void loadPizzaMenu()
      loads the PizzaMenu from the "pizzaMenu.xml" file in the Menu folder and adds the data to the ArrayList pizzaArray
      void loadSidesMenu()
      loads the SideMenu from the "sideMenu.xml"file in the Menu Folder and adds the data to the ArrayList sidesArray
      void loadStandartStartMenu()
      calling the startupMenu method in ItemPanel
      void newOrder()
      creates an new Order, new Till and calls the clear() and clearCustomerName() method of the OrderPanel
      int PizzaArraySize() 
      void saveTill()
      save the current till by calling the save() method in Till writes the current date and time according to ISO 8601 as the title of the .xml document call methods to calculate the total of the till and than add that data in the Order class all tills are saved to the Tills folder

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder(int numb,
            int quant)
              throws java.io.IOException
        calls getChoosenMenu() method from ItemPanel which returns what kind of menu the user has chosen from, than getting the chosen element out of an ArrayList inside the DataManager class and adding that to the current Order
        Parameters:
        numb - - int number of the chosen item inside the ArrayList
        quant - - int quantity for the chosen Item
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        return the size of the ArrayList in the current order

      • saveTill

        public void saveTill()
              throws java.io.IOException
        save the current till by calling the save() method in Till writes the current date and time according to ISO 8601 as the title of the .xml document call methods to calculate the total of the till and than add that data in the Order class all tills are saved to the Tills folder
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
